video_prompt: Anime girl shifts gaze right, gentle expression lingering. Her pigtails sway slightly as she subtly rocks back, placing her right foot behind her left. Background patterns subtly shimmer.
image_prompt: Full body anime portrait of a light-skinned girl with dark brown pigtails (parted down middle, to chest). She wears a cream-colored, wide-turtleneck sweater with a brown bowtie and pastel splotches, a short brown, green, white, and black plaid skirt with a side button, knee-high pale white stockings, and cream-colored leather boots with brown soles and laces. She has golden earrings and gazes gently to her right, with her right foot behind her left. Soft, even lighting creates a subtle ground shadow. White background with a dotted and floral pattern.
refined_video_prompt: An anime girl's gaze shifts right, her gentle expression persisting as pigtails sway gently. She subtly rocks back, repositioning her right foot behind the left. Background patterns subtly shimmer.
